item.title: Biophysical effects on soil crack morphology in a faunally active dryland vertisol
item.description:
DeCarlo, K.F. and Caylor, K.K. (2019) “Biophysical effects on soil crack morphology in a faunally active dryland vertisol”, Geoderma, doi:10.1016/j.geoderma.2018.07.042.

Abstract:Faunal behavior in dryland ecosystems may physically influence swelling soil hydrologic and pedologic processes due to its contributions to soil …
item.dc:creator: Keita DeCarlo
